changeSet.author: nahuel
changeSet.comment: Create cop_matrix table: cop values for pair of gids
changeSet.sql: create table cop_matrix ( gid1 int not null, gid2 int not null, cop double null, constraint pk_cop_gid1_gid2 primary key (gid1, gid2), constraint fk_cop_germplsm_gid1 foreign key (gid1) references germplsm (gid), constraint fk_cop_germplsm_gid2 foreign key (gid2) references germplsm (gid) ) comment 'coefficient of parentage matrix';
